item.title: John Riggio - Everlasting Fruitcake - Baritone Ukulele - Key of D
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE Ukulele.
Chords used: G, D, A, Dmaj7, D7, C, B7, Em7
By John Riggio. Available from Plank Road Publishing: https://www.musick8.com/store/alphadetail.php?product_group=701
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/vvnex5KCTdo
Chord chart ("Tabs") available at: https://ukutabs.com/r/reggio/everlasting-fruitcake/
***********************************************
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. Motion video background from https://www.motionbolt.com
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. If you don't have a podcast app, please check out Radio Public for all your podcasts--they support podcasters financially.
You are invited to visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (a free resource). Also on social media: Twitter (@UkeStuff) and Instagram (@ukestuff.info).
Want to make a donation towards this work? Visit https://www.buymeacoffee.com/ukestuff
Are you a teacher using ukulele in the classroom? Check out my video based method...effective, easy, and inexpensive! https://ukestuff.wordpress.com/the-video-ukulele-method/
Check out the "merch": https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: John Riggio - Everlasting Fruitcake - Key of D

item.title: Rockin Roary - All I Want For Christmas - Key of C
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Christmas Easy
All I Want For Christmas Is My two front Teeth Written by Don Gardener
Using the chords: Am C D7 E7 F G7
Suggested Strum Pattern: D DU D DU
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQxNRbyi3i4Nvqpo55bWBkg T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.

item.title: All I want for Christmas is My Two Front Teeth Ukulele Play Along - Key of C
item.description: For Educational Use. This video will be used for my ukulele players, with another class singing along. Chords used are: C, D7, G7, F, E7, and Am.

item.title: We Wish You A Merry Christmas - Ukulele Play Along - Key of G
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Christmas
We Wish You A Merry Christmas - Traditional
Using the chords: A Am B C D Em G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D D D or D DU DU
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQxNRbyi3i4Nvqpo55bWBkg T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.

item.title: Ella Fitzgerald - Have Yourself A Merry Little Christmas - Key of G
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Christmas
Have Yourself A Merry Little Christmas - Ella Fitzgerald version
Using the chords: A7 Am B7 Bm C D D7 E7 Em G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQxNRbyi3i4Nvqpo55bWBkg T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Saxophone Dreamsound - Driving Home for Christmas - Key of A
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Christmas
Driving Home For Christmas - Chris Rea
Using the chords: A Bm C#m7 D E7 Em F#m G I have simplified the chords to make the song accessible to more players. If you would prefer, you can replae the E7 chord tih an E and the C#m7 chord with a C#m.
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQxNRbyi3i4Nvqpo55bWBkg T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Chuck Berry - Run Run Rudolph - Key of C
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Christmas - Very easy
Run Rudolph Run - Chuck Berry Written by Johnny Marks and Marvin Brodie
Using the chords: C F G7
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU DU DU
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQxNRbyi3i4Nvqpo55bWBkg T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop

item.title: Greg Lake - I Believe in Father Christmas - Key of D
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Christmas

Using the chords: A C D Dsus2 G G6
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU D DU
